title: [LFM] - Plat-Diamond All Roles, New Made-From-Scratch Team

embed.description: Talh / Gold 1 70LP / 41W 35L Win Ratio 54% / Ahri - 16W 8L Win Ratio 67%, Ashe - 7W 3L Win Ratio 70%, Twitch - 3W 7L Win Ratio 30%, Annie - 3W 2L Win Ratio 60%, Vayne - 2W 2L Win Ratio 50%

body:
Hey, I'm Talh. Tired of people trying to put together teams, but being unresponsive/not dedicated. So, I'm going to just make my own. I do work a full-time job and have a bit of a personal life, so this won't be an all-day-every-day team. I'm currently Gold I this season; have a goal of high Diamond.

Team Goal: I want a group of 5 people (+1, for sub) to play serious ranked flex with this season, for fun. Also have the ability to jump in some online tournaments, and have easy access to solid duo partners.

Don't apply if:
1. You rage super hard easily.
2. You can't take constructive criticism.
3. Your peak rank is under Plat V.
4. You can't/don't communicate clearly in English.
5. You're inactive.

Times we'll play (Tentative):
Weekday evenings, 6:00 PM CST - 11:00 PM CST
Weekends, Anytime

Apply by posting below with or messaging me in-game with:
Role:
Rank (In each season you've played):
Age:
Main Champs:
Availability:
Any other comment you think is beneficial.

Thanks.

replies.body:
Role:mid/sup
Rank:s3silver. s4gold. s5 plat. s6 diamond
Age:17
Main Champs:viktor, ahri, azir, veig, taliyah, zilean, karma, lux
Availability:3:30 pst everyday (tuesdays and thursdays might change)
Any other comment you think is beneficial. I have almost a year experience on a competitive ranked team, we competed in a lcs style league and placed decently each season in it. im a pretty passive person so I get along with most people and I understand the difference in 5v5 situations and solo que situations pretty well due to my experience. I am open to learning new champs and can take criticism well.

Hey I am the Owner of NxG which is a competitive esports organization creating 5s teams. If your interested in join us add me in game or join our discord at https://discord.gg/kqbS2pj we have multiple scrim partners and coaches

Added in game already but gonna post here as well:

Role: Jg/ ADC
Rank (In each season you've played): Season 4 : silver 3 Season 5: plat 5 Season 6: Diamond 5
Age: 17
Main Champs: Kindred, Elise, Lee, Vayne, Cait, Ez
Availability: Pretty much every night past 7 pm all good on the weekends

> [{quoted}](name=nÃºb,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=k77NEoy3,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-12-22T20:08:19.367+0000)
>
> https://gyazo.com/9629680727370ce40fc057475f88fddc (plat+) lel
I edited main post to be more clear. Everyone is much lower rank than they'd typically be right now because of how Riot did placements this year.
UPDATE: Just looking for a Jungler to make 5's happen tonight. 6PM CST. Add me in-game or apply here, I'm checking it.

Role:Top/Adc
Rank (In each season you've played): Been P4-P1 like the last 3 seasons. Current P4(solo/duo) Flex unranked
Age: 21
Main Champs: Shen/Jhin/Poppy/Jinx/Maokai/Lucian/Gnar/Caitlin/Camille/Ezreal
Availability: About the same times but instead of 6pm cst its pst here. Weekends I'm mostly available the whole day.
Any other comment you think is beneficial.   Been playing the game for a long time and know how the game works mechanically. Know the matchups and how I should play, where I should be aggressive/ freezing/passive/ or pushing ik what I have to do and where I have to be positioned in team fights.
UPDATE: Have gotten a few adds in-game, but still looking for a jungle and ADC to apply. Going to play tonight at 6PM CST.

Role: Support
Rank (In each season you've played): S3: peaked gold 5. S4 and S5 peaked gold 1. S6 peaked plat 1 finshed plat 2
Age: 20
Main Champs: Bard, Thresh, Leona, Blitz.
Availability: most nights and weekends
Any other comment you think is beneficial. I tend to be pretty aggressive in lane,  so playing passive when they have champs that can capitalize on this is something i could work on as well as being 100% effective in chaotic teamfights.

So everyone has an idea what I'm like as a player, here's my application:

Role: Mid
Rank: S4: Plat 3, S5: Plat 3, S6: Gold 4 (Decayed Rank)
Age: 21
Main Champs: Ahri, Lux, Orianna
Availability: Most nights and weekends
Other Comments: I play very aggressive and draw lots of jungle attention. Am very obsessed with having the highest CS and pushing my lane opponent out of lane. Struggle with the win-lane-lose-game, so I'm guessing my macro play needs to be better and could improve on late-game decision making.
